name: Pintman: Escape the Lockdown
description:
Lockdown has been in place for many months, the pubs are closed and not a drop of a fresh pint is to be had anywhere.The people cry out for a hero, its time for a true Irishman to stand up and take matters into his own hands.

Join Pintman as he embarks on a  dangerous quest  to escape the Lockdown, avoid getting infected with de aul Covid, evade the Gardaí and find the fabled Bottomless Pint so that Lockdown can be ended in Ireland once and for all and the Pints can flow once more!

Note: This is an early version of the game, much more is planned.
